TEXT.BODY: THE FOLLOWING RAINFALL WAS RECORDED IN THE 24 HOURS UP TO (1200) GMT TODAY PARANA STATE: CASCAVEL NIL, PONTA GROSSA 0.2 MILLIMETRES, CAMPO MOURAO NIL, LONDRINA NIL, MARINGA NIL. RIO GRANDE DO SUL STATE: PASSO FUNDO NIL, SANTA MARIA NIL, CRUZ ALTA NIL, SAO LUIZ GONZAGA NIL. REUTER
